attributes.action: Legalise the use of E scooters for school travel
attributes.additional_details: Reduce road pollution by allowing this kind of travel especially for school journeys usually under 2 miles but to far for small children to walk and dangerous with the high number of cars and limited parking available during these times
attributes.background: Cut down on cars on morning commute by legalise the use of e scooters

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107
